text: Steve Bisciotti (born April 10, 1960 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA) is a Baltimore businessman. In 2004, he became the majority owner of the Baltimore Ravens. He bought the team in 2004 from previous owner Art Modell. He owns a business that works with technology and computers. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia
title: Steve Bisciotti
